name: Craig Miller
coverLetter: I have been trimming on and off for the past 15 years between my and other friends personal harvest in southern California. I was just laid off and am looking to move north to the Humboldt area to be more in nature....I am interested in full or part time trim work, to supplement my reduced income and enjoy the change of scenery:)))I am a very hard reliable worker with years of cannabis related knowledge and experience. I am extremly easy going and laid back!!! here is my instagram link @craigerzzz123_
